HotelName: The Lily Pad at Byron Bay

Description:
Quietly located within a 2-minute walk of Belongil Beach in the Byron Bay area, this modern apartment offers self-catering facilities. Byrons town centre is 1.5 km away.

Byron Bay Accom Unit 3 41 Childe Street - Belongil Beach Apartment has 3 levels with the 1st comprising of an open-plan kitchen and spacious living area. Two bedrooms, one bathroom and a large deck are located on the 2nd level. The master bedroom with a cathedral ceiling is situated on the third level. There are flat-screen TVs on each level.

Guests can relax on the private terrace with outdoor eating space and BBQ.  There is also an outdoor pebble shower.

Byron Bay Accom Unit 3 41 Childe Street - Belongil Beach Apartment is located a 10-minute drive away from the Byron Bay Golf Course. Free private parking is possible on site. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of AUD 500 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that Belongil Beach Apartment does not accept payments with American Express/Diners Club credit cards. Please note that this property does not have any policies, procedures or resources in place to accommodate the unique needs of school graduates during the annual Schoolies Week period. It does not have adequate resources to engage qualified security personnel to guarantee the safety, comfort and convenience of school graduate guests during this period. Please note that this property has a No Party Policy. Guests under the age of 21 can only check in with a parent.
Address: 3/41 Childe Street Belongil BeachByron BayNew South Wales 2481

Description:
Belongil Beach is ideally located just 1.5km north of Byrons town centre. The unspoiled white beach is only a 2 minute walk from your holiday accommodation. A leisurely 15-20 min stroll along the beach will find you in the heart of Byron. Belongil Beach is known for its relaxed and carefree atmosphere. Just 500-metres from Belongil Beach, Hideaway At Belongil is a 1-bedroom apartment featuring a balcony. After a day at the beach come home to a relaxing haven complete with a fully equipped kitchen.

Belongil Hideaway is a 5-minute drive from Byron Bay Main Beach and a 10-minute drive from Cape Byron Lighthouse. Ballina Byron Gateway Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

The apartment features a dining and lounge area with a TV and a DVD player. It also has an outdoor dining area on the balcony. The bathroom has a shower and a toilet.  A damage deposit of AUD 500 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that this property does not have any policies, procedures or resources in place to accommodate the unique needs of school graduates during the annual Schoolies Week period. It does not have adequate resources to engage qualified security personnel to guarantee the safety, comfort and convenience of school graduate guests during this period. Please note that this property has a No Party Policy. Guests under the age of 21 can only check in with a parent. Please note that this property does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

Description:
Boasting a balcony with sea views, a bar and massage services, 2 Copacabana, 61 Sandy Point Road - cute unit with water views from the balcony can be found in Corlette, close to Corlette Beach and 500 metres from Sandy Point Beach. Featuring free private parking, the holiday home is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as windsurfing, diving and fishing.

The holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. The holiday home also offers a seating area and 1 bathroom.

A barbecue is available on site and snorkelling can be enjoyed within close proximity of the holiday home.

Salamander Bay is 700 metres from 2 Copacabana, 61 Sandy Point Road - cute unit with water views from the balcony, while Anchorage Marina Port Stephens is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Newcastle Airport, 31 km from the accommodation. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
This property is located in a residential area and guests are asked to refrain from excessive noise.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please note that bed linen and towels are not included in the price. You can rent them at the property or bring your own. All guests must sign the propertys Terms of Stay.

Description:
Featuring a saltwater swimming pool and barbecue facilities, Lincoln Cottage Motor Inn offers relaxed, spacious and comfortable accommodation in central Wagga Wagga. All air-conditioned rooms come with an en suite bathroom and cable TV.

The rooms at Lincoln Cottage Motor Inn all have a work desk and tea and coffee making facilities. The Executive King Room features a beautiful, modern free-standing bath tub, while the Family Rooms and Family Suites include a well equipped kitchenette.

Other facilities at the property include a guest laundry and covered childrens play area.

Lincoln Cottage Motor Inn is located just a 10-minute walk from the main shopping precinct and is nearby local landmarks. Restaurants, cafes and a supermarket are located next door to the property.
Address: 337 Edward St Wagga WaggaNew South Wales 2650

Description:
Set just less than 1 km from Point Longsdale Back Beach, Tussock Sands offers accommodation in Point Lonsdale with access to free bikes, a garden, as well as a shared kitchen. Located 29 km from South Geelong Station, the property provides a shared lounge and free private parking.

The holiday home is fitted with 4 bedrooms, a kitchen with fridge and oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and a washing machine. A flat-screen TV and Blu-ray player are offered.

Staff at the holiday home are always available to provide information at the reception.

A terrace and a childrens playground are available for guests at Tussock Sands to use.

Geelong Train Station is 30 km from the accommodation, while North Geelong Train Station is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Avalon Airport, 54 km from Tussock Sands. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that there is a 1.5% charge when you pay with a Visa or Mastercard credit card.

Please note that this property does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

Please note that the reception opening hours are as follows:
09:00-15:00 Monday to Friday
If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform the property in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Late check-out may be available, subject to availability, for an additional charge. 12:00 late check-out is an additional AUD 50. 14:00 late check-out is an additional AUD 115.

Please note that bed linen is not included in the price. You can rent them at the property or bring your own. Linen hire is an additional charge of AUD 50 per bed or both linen hire and bed-making is an additional charge of AUD 75 per bed, payable at time of booking.

Please note that pets can be accommodated on request, for an additional charge of AUD 33.

Beach Club 2, 5 Gowing Street, a property with barbecue facilities, is located in Crescent Head, 700 metres from Killick Beach. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking.

The holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom.

The nearest airport is Port Macquarie Airport, 61 km from Beach Club 2, 5 Gowing Street. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of AUD 500 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that bed linen and towels are not included in the price. Please bring your own or let the property know if you would like to hire linen.

Description:
With Palm Cove Beach reachable in 100 metres, Sea Temple Palm Cove provides accommodation, a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a bar. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the aparthotel free of charge.

The accommodation comes with a TV and a private bathroom with shower, bath and free toiletries, while the kitchen features a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. A microwave, a stovetop and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

Sea Temple Palm Cove offers a hot tub.

A range of water sports facilities is available on site and both hiking and cycling can be enjoyed within close proximity of the accommodation.

Clifton Beach is 700 metres from Sea Temple Palm Cove, while Ellis Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Cairns, 23 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that there is a 1.5% charge when you pay with a Visa or Mastercard credit card. Please note that there is a 3.5% charge when you pay with an American Express credit card. Please note that this property is privately owned and is not associated with the onsite building managers/reception. All guests must sign the propertys Terms of Stay. The property will be in touch after booking using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, The Beach House is located in Coffin Bay. This beachfront property offers access to a patio and free private parking.

The holiday home features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

The holiday home offers a terrace.

Port Lincoln Marina is 45 km from The Beach House, while The Fountain is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Port Lincoln Airport, 54 km from the accommodation. A damage deposit of AUD 300 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that there is a 2% charge when you pay with a Visa or Mastercard credit card.

Please note that bed linen and towels are not included in the price. You can rent them at the property or bring your own.

Please note that this property will not be serviced for the duration of your stay.

Please note that this property has a strict No Party Policy.

Description:
The Middle Pub is situated in Mullumbimby, within 10 km of Brunswick Boat Harbour and 23 km of Minyon Falls Lookout. The property is around 22 km from Cape Byron Lighthouse, 22 km from Byron Bay Golf Course and 40 km from Big Prawn. Guests can enjoy Australian dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.

The rooms have a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at the inn have a balcony. At The Middle Pub rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Cudgen Nature Reserve is 38 km from the accommodation, while Norries Headland is 39 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ballina Byron Gateway Airport, 42 km from The Middle Pub.

Description:
Featuring free WiFi, an indoor pool and a restaurant, Cameo Inn Motel offers rooms in West Wyalong. West Wyalong Golf Club is 3 km away. Guests enjoy free covered on-site parking.

Each air-conditioned room has a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV with cable channels. The bathroom comes with a shower.

The restaurant serves Indian a as well as a modern Australian menu including steaks, fish and chicken.

Cameo Inn Motel is a 3-minute drive from the centre of West Wyalong. West Wyalong Regional Airport is 3 km away. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Please note that there is a 3.5% charge when you pay with an American Express or Diners Club credit card.
Address: 263 Neeld Street West WyalongNew South Wales 2671

Description:

Coffs Harbour Racecourse is 1.1 km from Jetty House, while Park Beach Plaza is 2.8 km away. Coffs Harbour Airport is 2 km from the property. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Featuring sea views, Avalon 4 provides accommodation with a balcony and a kettle, around 500 metres from Yamba Beach. This apartment features a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

Description:
Hunter Valley Travellers Rest Motel offers comfortable air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy and outdoor meal using the barbecue area.

Each room at Travellers Rest Motel includes a refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities. All rooms are very quiet as they are situated away from the road.

Quiet and intimate, The Courtyard Restaurant is open each morning for breakfast. The property is a 5-minute drive to the cafes and restaurants in Cessnock town centre.

Guests have access to a spacious garden area and a tour desk. The vineyards of the Hunter Valley are just a 10-minute drive from Travellers Rest Motel. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
A damage deposit of AUD 100 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Guests arriving outside reception opening hours are kindly requested to inform the hotel in advance. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

Please note that there is a 2.5% surcharge on all credit card transactions including Visa, Mastercard etc. And, 3.5% charge when you pay with an American Express or Diners Club credit card.

Please note that this property requires a $100 bond upon check in to cover any incidental charges, damage to the property or excessive cleaning fees.

Please note there is a $10 charge per hour for early check-in before 14:00, late check-in after 22:00 and late check out after 10:00.

Located in Clifton Beach, within 2.9 km of Ellis Beach, Luxury Executive Residence On The Beachfront offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and an outdoor swimming pool. This holiday home has a private pool, a garden and free private parking.

The holiday home features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

The nearest airport is Cairns Airport, 23 km from the holiday home. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Luxury Executive Residence On The Beachfront in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
 A damage deposit of AUD 350 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.

Situated in Cooroy, 28 km from Noosa National Park, Thirlestane Farm Cottage & Barn features accommodation with a garden, free WiFi, a shared kitchen, and a shared lounge. Located 47 km from Aussie World, the property provides a terrace and free private parking.

The farm stay consists of 4 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a living room.

A barbecue is available on site and cycling can be enjoyed within close proximity of the farm stay.

The Ginger Factory is 24 km from Thirlestane Farm Cottage & Barn, while Big Pineapple is 32 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sunshine Coast Airport, 42 km from the accommodation. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Just 2 minutes walk from Main Beach, Byron Bay Accom Unit 1 2 Fletcher Street Pipis on the Beach 1 features air-conditioned accommodation with a flat-screen TV. Guests can relax on the spacious balcony.

Accommodation includes a dining area, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. There is also a DVD player, a sofa and ironing facilities. The private bathroom has a bathtub and a shower.

Byron Bay Accom Unit 1 2 Fletcher Street Pipis on the Beach 1 Byron Bay is a 2-minute drive from Byron Bay Railway Station and vibrant Byron Bay town centre, with a variety of cafes, restaurants and boutique shops. Cape Byron Lighthouse is a 5-minute drive away, and is the most easterly point on the Australian mainland. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of AUD 500 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.
Guests under the age of 21 an only check in with a parent.

Please note that this property does not have any policies, procedures or resources in place to accommodate the unique needs of school graduates during the annual Schoolies Week period. It does not have adequate resources to engage qualified security personnel to guarantee the safety, comfort and convenience of school graduate guests during this period.

Description:
Black Palm Cape Tribulation is a self-catering, air-conditioned villa designed for a luxury stay, surrounded by the Daintree Rainforest and overlooking a seasonal creek. This property offers free covered parking.

The creek-side cabin is completely private and offers a double spa bath, double walk-in shower and a super king-sized bed with floor-to-ceiling windows providing stunning views. There is a covered deck area with an outdoor setting so you can enjoy views of the creek. There is also a kitchenette with a dishwasher, microwave, 2 burner gas stove top and a refrigerator with a ice box.

Your stay includes free WiFi and covered parking. A breakfast hamper and extras (including wine, taster chocolates, bathrobes, slippers, eye masks, bath salts and tealights) are available. You are advised to bring your own vehicle as this property is not serviced by public transport.
A damage deposit of AUD 200 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.
Please note that this property does not have an elevator, it is accessible via stairs only.

Please note that internet service is via satellite. You may experience slower internet services.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Set in Cowes, less than 1 km from Erehwon Point Beach, a 11-minute walk from Cowes Beach and 1.4 km from Red Rock Beach, Summers Inn offers accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Guests staying at this holiday home have access to a patio.

The air-conditioned holiday home is composed of 5 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, and 3 bathrooms. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go golfing nearby.

Phillip Island Wildlife Park is 3.2 km from the holiday home, while A MazeN Things is 6.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Essendon Fields Airport, 150 km from Summers Inn. This property is located in a residential area and guests are asked to refrain from excessive noise.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please note that sheets, pillow cases and towels are not provided. Guests can bring their own or rent them before arrival at an extra cost:
- AUD 15 per single bed
- AUD 30 per double bed

Description:
Offering sea views, Shoreline 7 is an accommodation set in Tuncurry, less than 1 km from Tuncurry Beach and 2 km from Forster Beach. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, and 2 bathrooms with a shower, a hairdryer and a washing machine. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

Pebbly Beach is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Myall Lakes is 40 km from the property. The nearest airport is Taree Airport, 39 km from Shoreline 7. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay.
This property is located in a residential area and guests are asked to refrain from excessive noise.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
A damage deposit of AUD 250 is required. The host charges this 14 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that there is a 2% surcharge when you pay with a credit card.

Description:
Take a step into a natural wonderland in Noosa Hinterlands most loved Bed & Breakfast located just 25 minutes from Noosa Main beach. Family run and owned accommodation in the Noosa Hinterland that offers not only unique Accommodation in Noosa, but it also offers Pet-Friendly Rooms.

The expansive verandah boasts views across the Noosa National Park to the Carlo Sand Blow at Rainbow Beach.

Picture yourself sitting around our fire pit overlooking Noosa National Park listening to the many birds or watching a wallaby or kangaroo hop by just soaking it all in.

With a shared kitchen between guests and the owners, you will get a sense of warmth and as if you have come home to grandmas house.

The property was built in the 1920s and has lovingly restored and redecorated to capture the vintage beauty of the iconic homestead. Once you step onto the property you instantly become a part of the family.

PLEASE NOTE : As this property is currently on the market we are only taking bookings 30 days in advance, due to the property being on the market there is no breakfast available currently, although you may use our well equipped commercial kitchen or visit one of the cafes in neighbouring towns Please inform Noosa Hinterland Escape in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, each unit also comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

Description:

This air-conditioned holiday home is fitted with 4 bedrooms, a TV, and a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave.

A barbecue is available for guests to use at the holiday home.

Port Macquarie is 41 km from Malibu Holiday House, 6 Dulconghi Street, while Kempsey is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Port Macquarie Airport, 38 km from the accommodation. Description:
Located in Clifton Beach, within a few steps of Clifton Beach and 500 metres of Kewarra Beach, Decked Out By The Sea offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony and free private parking.

Featuring a Blu-ray player, the holiday home has a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 4 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms with a shower and a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the holiday home.

The holiday home offers a barbecue.

Palm Cove Beach is 2 km from Decked Out By The Sea, while Cairns Station is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Cairns, 20 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Decked Out By The Sea in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
With access to a natural freshwater creek for swimming, Cow Bay Homestay B&B is a 17-minute drive from the Daintree Rainforest. Guests can relax outdoors in the spectacular gardens or book an activity through the tour desk.

Cow Bay B&B is a 7-minute drive from the Daintree Airport and a 20-minute drive from the Daintree River. Cape Tribulation is a 35-minute drive away.

All air-conditioned rooms feature garden views and a lounge area. They offer a bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a toilet. Some rooms have mountain views.

Guests can socialise in the shared lounge/library area or enjoy the lovely views outdoors on the terrace. Please note that Cow Bay Homestay B&B does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Set in Crackenback and only 36 km from Snowy Mountains, Crackenback 27 offers accommodation with lake views, free WiFi and free private parking. This apartment is 29 km from Lake Jindabyne and 45 km from Perisher Blue Ski Resort.

The apartment with a balcony and mountain views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Ski storage space is available on site and skiing can be enjoyed within close proximity of the apartment.

Ski Tube is 2 km from Crackenback 27, while Thredbo Alpine Village is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Cooma-Snowy Mountains Airport, 69 km from the accommodation. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of AUD 1000 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 14 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that there is a 1.5% charge when you pay with EFTPOS or a Visa or Mastercard credit card, and a 3% charge when you pay with an American Express credit card.

Please note that the property requires a AUD $1,000 credit card pre-authorisation upon check in.

You will receive a second email direct from Australian Alpine Resorts within 24 hours with your check-in and key collection details.

Description:
Boasting an outdoor pool and garden views, Rons Beach House is set in Byron Bay. This holiday home features a private pool, a garden and free private parking.

The holiday home with a patio and pool views has 4 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the holiday home.

A barbecue is available for guests to use at the holiday home.

Belongil Beach is 300 metres from Rons Beach House, while Main Beach is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ballina Byron Gateway, 26 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of AUD 500 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that there is a 2% surcharge when you pay with a credit card.
Address: 75 Shirley Street Byron BayNew South Wales 2481

Description:
the pub was built in 1992 and has one of the longest one piece timber bars in the southern hemisphere and all the timber in the property has come from the land it sits on (including the tables). Located in Cow Bay, 1.3 km from Daintree Discovery Centre, Cow Bay Hotel Motel features air-conditioned rooms and free private parking. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

The rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms have a seating area where you can relax. You will find a kettle in the room and a small bar fridge. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom.

You will find a gift shop at the property.

You can play billiards and darts at the bed and breakfast. The nearest airport is Cairns Airport, 80 km from the property.

Description:
Featuring direct access to the beach, Hoey Moey Backpackers offers a bistro, bar and free parking. It is a 10-minute walk from Coffs Harbours Shopping Plaza. Free duvets and linen are provided.

All rooms are fitted with a fridge and a TV set. The en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities. Guests have free access to luggage storage and secure lockers. Laundry facilities are available.

Guests can rent mountain bikes, or enjoy free use of fishing rods, BBQ facilities and body boards. Free transfers to and from the bus stop and train station are offered. There is a shared lounge as well as a communal kitchen at the property.

Beachside Bistro serves a variety of western dishes. Beers and wines can be enjoyed at the bar. There is free live music from Wednesday to Sunday.

Hoey Moey Backpackers Coffs Harbour is a 6-minute drive from the Big Banana, Jetty Dive Centre and the National Marine Science Centre Aquarium. The Pet Porpoise Pool, which offers up-close dolphin swims and live shows is just 3 minutes drive  away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Please note that all guests must be able to provide a valid photo ID. International guests are required to present a passport.

Please note that the property cannot accept guests under the age of 18 and over the age of 30 years in dormitory rooms.

Please note that there is a 1.6% charge when you pay with a Visa credit card and and a 1.2% charge when you pay with a Visa debit card. There is a 1.7% charge when you pay with a MasterCard credit card and a 0.9% charge when you pay with a MasterCard debit card.
Address: 84 Ocean Parade Coffs HarbourNew South Wales 2450

Description:
Welcome to Coffs Harbour YHA, the awakening  gem of the NSW North Coast. Our hostel is situated in the dynamic Jetty precinct across the road from the beach and harbour. Discover our quality uncrowded surfing beaches or take a day trip to the heritage listed Dorrigo National Park. Situated just 350 metres from Coffs Harbour Beach and the historic Coffs Harbour Jetty, this hostel offers free WiFi, free surfboards, free body boards, free snorkeling and fishing gear. Guests enjoy free onsite parking and a communal TV area.

There is a spacious shared kitchen which offers a large walk-in refrigerator and a dining area. The games room offers table tennis and guest have access to a pool and BBQ area surrounded by sun loungers. A supermarket, liquor store and pub are opposite YHA Coffs.

Each room has a ceiling fan and all linen is provided. Dormitories include reading lights and personal lockers. Private rooms with an en suite bathroom are available.

The tour desk books local activities such as horse riding, walking trails and kayaking. There is a popular tour to Moonee Nature Reserve, the Big Banana and the Sealy Lookout.

Coffs Harbour YHA is 500 metres from Coffs Harbour Railway Station and a 10-minute drive from The Big Banana. The hostel offers free pickup from the airport and bus station. Please note that there is a AUD$1 charge when you pay with a credit card.

Please note that children under 18 years of age must be accompanied by an adult. Children are only allowed to stay in private accommodation. Children are not allowed to stay in dormitory rooms.

A free pick up service is available from the airport. Please inform Coffs Harbour YHA in advance if you want to use this service, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Children are welcome, but are not permitted to stay in dormitory rooms.
Children aged 17 need a letter from a parent/legal guardian to stay in dormitory rooms.
If children are 16 or under, they will need a parent/legal guardian aged over 21 to stay with them in a private room.
Address: 51 Collingwood Street Coffs HarbourNew South Wales 2450

Description:
Located in Cairns, less than 1 km from Cairns Convention Centre and a 5-minute walk from Cairns Rainforest Dome, Luxury Waterfront Escape On The Harbour 315 offers a fitness centre and air conditioning. Guests benefit from a patio and an outdoor pool.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a cable TV, a washing machine and a kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cairns Regional Gallery, The Center of Contemporary Arts and The Cairns Civic Theater. The nearest airport is Cairns Airport, 8 km from Luxury Waterfront Escape On The. A security deposit of AUD 150 is required upon arrival for incidentals. This deposit is fully refundable upon check-out and subject to a damage inspection of the accommodation.

Description:
Set amongst tropical gardens and featuring an outdoor pool with hammocks to relax in, Tropic Days Boutique Hostel is set in Cairns and provides free WiFi and a free light breakfast of breads and spreads.

Tropic Days Boutique Hostel is located 1 km from Cairns Railway Station and is a 20-minute walk from Cairns Esplanade and Cairns Pier. There is a complimentary bus shuttle available, to take you in to town. Cairns Airport is 6 km from the property.

Each room includes fans as well as all bed linen and towels . Guests have access to shared bathroom facilities. Air-conditioning is available for an additional cost.

Guests can enjoy the free billiards table. There is a shared fully equipped kitchens and laundry facilities available for guests use. Free luggage storage, free bike hire and free beach towel hire are available. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property.
Please inform Tropic Days Boutique Hostel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that air-conditioning is available in each room, for an additional charge.

Please note that this property does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

Please note that there is a 1% charge when you pay with a credit card.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian and cannot be accommodated in the dormitory rooms.

Description:
Located in Yass town centre, Thunderbird Motel offers free Wi-Fi, a bar, restaurant and swimming pool. All accommodation features a kitchenette and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Ewen Me Restaurant is a great place to enjoy breakfast or an evening meal. It serves tasty dishes including steak and fresh seafood. A full room service menu is available.

Motel Thunderbird is within 10 minutes walk from Yass Showgrounds and Yass District Hospital. Careys Limestone Caves is a 50-minute drive away.

Your air-conditioned room offers a DVD player, microwave and refrigerator. The en suite bathroom has a hairdryer and free toiletries. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Fri 31 Mar 2023 until Sat 30 Sept 2023
If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform Thunderbird Motel in advance, using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Please note that there is a 1.3% surcharge when you pay with a Visa, MasterCard, Amex or Diners credit card.

Description:
Wentworth Central Motor Inn in Wentworth features 4-star accommodation with a garden, a shared lounge and barbecue facilities. With an outdoor swimming pool, the 4-star motel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Staff on site can arrange a shuttle service.

Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. At the motel each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Wentworth Central Motor Inn offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub.

The nearest airport is Mildura Airport, 28 km from the accommodation. Select rooms are available for pet friendly options, please contact us for details on which rooms are pet friendly.

Description:
Bright Uptown is located in Bright and offers barbecue facilities. The air-conditioned accommodation is 33 km from Mount Hotham, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site.

The holiday home is equipped with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with mountain views.

A water park is available on site and both hiking and fishing can be enjoyed within close proximity of the holiday home.

Falls Creek is 32 km from Bright Uptown, while Dinner Plain is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Albury Airport, 108 km from the accommodation. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Please inform Bright Uptown in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that the number of bedrooms accessible for the duration of your stay, depends on how many guests have booked. Access to all other areas of the property are not determined by guest numbers. For more information please contact the property using the contact details found on the booking confirmation.

Description:
Located in Byron Bay, this apartment features a barbecue. The apartment is 900 metres from Arakwal National Park.

A dishwasher and a microwave can be found in the kitchen. A TV and DVD player is featured.

Cape Byron Lighthouse is 1 km from 10/130 Lighthouse Rd, Byron Bay - James Cook Apartments, while Tallow Beach is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Ballina Byron Gateway Airport, 22 km from the property. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of AUD 1000 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that this property does not have any policies, procedures or resources in place to accommodate the unique needs of school graduates during the annual Schoolies Week period. It does not have adequate resources to engage qualified security personnel to guarantee the safety, comfort and convenience of school graduate guests during this period. Please note that this property has a No Party Policy. Guests under the age of 21 can only check in with a parent. Please note that this property does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

Description: The Embassy Motel Canberra is an affordable and comfortable motel in a quiet location only minutes from Parliament House and the Canberra CBD. Description:
At Mad Monkey Waterfront we offer an affordable and clean accommodation in the heart of Cairns, the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef. Being located on the Cairns Esplanade with the Cairns Lagoon just across the street, you can pop down for a dip or spend the afternoon sunbathing anytime you fancy! At Mad Monkey Waterfront you will have no problem staying active as we offer a Free Access to a local gym. Thanks to our ultra-fast Free Wi-Fi throughout the property, you wont miss out on anything. Enjoy our fully equipped kitchen to cook your own meals. Unwind in our common room after a great day out, exploring all-natural wonders that Cairns and its surroundings have to offer. Get to know other guests over board games, a PlayStation tournament or by watching a film together on Netflix provided!

Become a part of our Mad Monkey Family & enjoy your stay!

Mad Monkey Waterfront is located directly on the Cairns Esplanade with all the bars, restaurants, shops, The Reef Terminal and the Night Markets just within a short walking distance. Cairns Lagoon is just across the road with a Free Access.Plane: We highly recommend you book a taxi or and Uber - we do offer an airport shuttle for a surcharge please call reception between 9AM & 5PM to book this in. Were only a fifteen-minute drive away from the airport. Bus: Mad Monkey Backpackers Waterfront is located only a 5-minute walk distance from the Greyhound and Premier Bus services. Train: The main Train station is only a 10 min walk away.

Our reception is open from 8AM - 8PM. You can check in at 2PM. If you arrive after 8PM please inform reception beforehand so they can prepare your late check in. We use GOKI for our door locks & we highly recommend to download the GOKI App before you arrive.

We offer all types of accommodation, from Mixed Dorms Ensuite to Female Dorms Ensuite and Private Double Rooms. We have high-quality mattresses, pillows and linen which is included for a comfortable nights sleep. All our dorms have a private en-suite bathroom and all our private rooms come with personal towels, otherwise our reception team is more than happy to assist you with a towel hire in case you forgot one. All our rooms are Air-Conditioned & All our bunk beds are equipped with personal USB ports & power sockets to make sure you can comfortably scroll through your new travel pictures from bed. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Mad Monkey Backpackers Waterfront in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Guests are required to show valid photo ID (passport or drivers license) upon check-in.

The property cannot accept guests under the age of 18 years.

All guests must sign the propertys Terms of Stay.

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Please note that there is a 1% charge when you pay with a credit card.

Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and a bar, Windsor Hotel Motel Dalby is located 2 minutes walk from Dalby Shoppingworld. It features air-conditioned accommodation with a flat-screen TV.

The on-site restaurant offers seafood, pasta and succulent steaks. Enjoy a cold beer or glass or wine from the bar, and on weekends enjoy live music and karaoke.

Windsor Hotel is 3 minutes drive from Dalby Railway Station and 5 minutes drive from Bunya Park Racecourse. Bunya Mountains National Park is 60 minutes drive away.

All accommodation features cable TV, a refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities. Some accommodation features a fully equipped kitchen and a patio. Please note that there is a 4% charge when you pay with a Diners Club credit card.

Please note that you must check in at the bar.

Description:
Just a 2-minute walk from Byron Bay Main Beach, Byron Bay Accom Unit 6 21-25 Fletcher Street - A Seventh Heaven is a 3-bedroom apartment with a balcony and outdoor dining area. After a day at the beach, you can share a meal using the BBQ facilities.

Seventh Heaven is a 5-minute drive from both Cape Byron Lighthouse and Byron Bay Golf Course. Ballina Byron Gateway Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen and a dining area. Relax in the lounge area complete with a TV and DVD player. Also on offer are a washing machine and 2 bathrooms.

Guests enjoy free parking. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of AUD 1000 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that A Seventh Heaven does not accept payments with American Express credit cards. Guests under the age of 21 can only check in with a parent or official guardian. Please note that this property does not have any policies, procedures or resources in place to accommodate the unique needs of school graduates during the annual Schoolies Week period. It does not have adequate resources to engage qualified security personnel to guarantee the safety, comfort and convenience of school graduate guests during this period. Please note that this property has a No Party Policy.

Description:
Situated in Byron Bay, 2.4 km from Belongil Beach, Sunrise Guesthouse features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is set 2.5 km from Main Beach, 5.4 km from Cape Byron Lighthouse and 6.2 km from Byron Bay Golf Course. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen and free WiFi.

At the guest house, rooms come with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at Sunrise Guesthouse have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Big Prawn is 32 km from the accommodation, while Brunswick Boat Harbour is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ballina Byron Gateway Airport, 27 km from Sunrise Guesthouse. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Set in Byfield in the Queensland region, Getaways at Byfield offers accommodation with free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. The accommodation is air conditioned and is fitted with a spa bath.

All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries, shower, hot tub and bath. A fridge, a microwave and stovetop are also offered in the kitchen, as well as a kettle.

A Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the lodge.

Guests can swim in the outdoor swimming pool, go hiking or fishing, or relax in the garden and use the barbecue facilities.

Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.

Description:
Being an authentically restored Victorian State Bank managers residence, everything about Edwardia Shortstay invites your to relax into 1905, when it was built. Enjoy views to the towns iconic Italian clocktower from the bedrooms. Play board-games by one of the cosy, slow-combustion wood fires or dip into the extensive library of Edwardian literature, events, artwork and past-times. Play dress-ups from our Edwardian wardrobe and have high tea in the extensive drawing room. Enjoy seasonal fruit in the garden and be sure to take our internet based house tour , which tells the stories of Australias convicts, goldminers, pioneer small-farmers and local aboriginals via the ancestral photographs and artefacts displayed on the walls. Edwardia Short-Stay is set in Camperdown. The accommodation is 46 km from Colac, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site.

The holiday home has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 3 bathrooms with a hot tub.

Guests at the holiday home can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the garden.  A damage deposit of AUD 300 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.

Description:
Located in Cobar, Oasis Motel provides a shared lounge. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. There is an outdoor pool and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking.

At the motel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with pool view. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The nearest airport is Cobar Airport, 5 km from Oasis Motel. Please inform Oasis Motel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Located on the Old Pacific highway in Woolgoolga, Rosebourne Gardens Motel offers spacious ground-floor rooms with free Wi-Fi and free satellite TV. Relax by the outdoor pool, which offers BBQ facilities nearby, or drive 3 minutes to the beach.

Each air-conditioned room includes an en suite bathroom, tea/coffee making facilities, a refrigerator, ironing facilities and a toaster. In-house movie channels are available. Microwaves and cots can be requested at the front desk. Pet friendly rooms are available.

Continental breakfast can be served to the room and includes breakfast cereals, toast, fruit juice, jam, butter and fresh milk. It is a 5-minute walk to the Seaview Tavern, a family-friendly bistro.

Coffs Harbour is a 20-minute drive away. It is 15 minutes walk from Rosebourne Gardens Motel Woolgoolga to Main Beach, which has a childrens playground, BBQ area and picnic facilities. Please note that only certain rooms are pet friendly. For more information, please contact the motel in advance using the contact details on the booking confirmation.

Please note that this property does not accept payments with American Express credit cards.

The property features garden views and is 1.6 km from ReefHQ Aquarium and a 10-minute walk to the New Cowboys Stadium. The property offers a private entrance and car park.

With direct access to a terrace, the air-conditioned apartment consists of a fully equipped kitchen and a flat-screen TV. The apartment also has a seating area and a bathroom.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the property.

Both fishing and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of the apartment.

Magnetic Island Ferry terminal is 2.5 km from A City Retreat, 2BR Apartment - Reid Park -Townsville, while The Strand is 2.5 km from the property. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Lighthouse Lodge is located in Byron Bay, less than 1 km from Main Beach and a 13-minute walk from Clarkes Beach, in an area where fishing can be enjoyed. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Tallow Beach, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with fridge and oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a washing machine. A flat-screen TV is provided.

Cape Byron Lighthouse is 3 km from the apartment, while Byron Bay Golf Course is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Ballina Byron Gateway Airport, 24 km from Lighthouse Lodge. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
This property is located in a residential area and guests are asked to refrain from excessive noise.
A damage deposit of AUD 500 is required. The host charges this 14 days before arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that there is a 2% surcharge when you pay with a credit card.

Description:
Boosting a beautiful location on the Corfu island, one of the northern islands of Greece, deeply marked by the history and mythology of Greece. Here, Poseidon the god of the sea, has abducted the daughter of Asopos, and  had a child called Phaiax, and the island 's  nick name  was the island of the Phaecians.
 This property is in a small village called Gouvia only 8 minutes away from the Molfeta beach, and due to its central location becomes ideal to explore the island by car or by bike. This property is featuring air conditioning and WIFI in public areas, billiards, besides  the spacious outdoor pool and barbeque facilities that make the best of guests' holiday. 
Apartments and studios come with a fully equipped kitchen and private bathroom, being situated in the garden area making them the perfect place for comfort and relaxation after a day visiting the local taverns, restaurants, bars or shops.Corfu city lies at 9 km away .

Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Locazione Turistica Tulipano is located in Sughera. Private parking is available on site.

The 2-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge and dishwasher, and 2 bathrooms with bidet.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Montecatini Train Station is 49 km from the apartment. The nearest airport is Pisa International Airport, 50 km from Locazione Turistica Tulipano. Aircondition optional available. Heating optional available. 1 Babycot available, charges apply.

Description:
Located in Praia do Rosa, 400 metres from Praia do Rosa Beach, Kalani Pousada provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Located around 2 km from Luz Beach, the inn with free WiFi is also 2.4 km away from Vermelha Beach. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, room service and currency exchange for guests.

At the inn each room is equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with pool view. Every room has a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace and others also offer sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Kalani Pousada offers a barbecue. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Praia do Rosa, like hiking and cycling.

Garopaba Bus Station is 17 km from Kalani Pousada, while Siriu Dunes is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Ghizzo Bortoluzzi Airport, 94 km from the inn. Please inform Kalani Pousada in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.
Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).

Description:
Collina Verde is quietly set a 10-minute walk from the centre of Ascona, 1.5 km from Lake Maggiore and the beach, and offers a self-catered studio with a patio, free access to an outdoor pool and WiFi internet. Free parking is available on site.

The unit is provided with a flat-screen cable TV, a well-appointed kitchenette with a dining table, a seating area with a sofa and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests can enjoy their meals in the outdoor dining area, or relax in the garden, which is provided with sunbeds. Barbecue facilities are also at the guests disposal.

The closest restaurant is 200 metres from Collina Verde, while a café and a grocery store can be reached within 1 km. The property is 800 m from Monte Verità and 1.6 km from Golfclub Patriziale Ascona. Please note that baby cots are not available at the hotel. You may bring your own baby cot for your stay.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Frank Porter - Al Alka 1 is well set in The Greens district of Dubai, 6 km from Mall of the Emirates and 8 km from The Walk at JBR. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.9 km from Barasti Beach, and guests benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, a TV with cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and an oven.

At the apartment guests are welcome to take advantage of a fitness room.

Burj Al Arab Tower is 8 km from Frank Porter - Al Alka 1, while Aquaventure Waterpark is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Al Maktoum International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.  A damage deposit of AED 800 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Featuring garden views, Swafield Hall in Swafield offers accommodation, a tennis court and barbecue facilities. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The sea coast and sandy beaches are only 4 km from the the property.

The units include a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The East and South Wing Apartments have a dishwasher, an oven and microwave as well as a kettle. Nelsons Suite and Blue Suite do not have a kitchen but a kettle is provided along with a microwave and breakfast facilities are available in the conservatory.

The apartment offers a childrens playground.

Guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Norwich is 26 km from Swafield Hall, while Great Yarmouth is 34 km away. Norwich International Airport is 21 km from the property. Please inform Swafield Hall in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
Please note that the property can only allow pets with a maximum weight of 25 kilos.
Managed by a private host

Description:

Each air-conditioned apartment will provide you with a satellite flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. The bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

At Valgrande Bibione Casone you will find a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and bicycle rental. The property offers free parking.

Lignano Sabbiadoro is a 15-minute drive from the property. Latisana is 21 km away. Please inform Valgrande Bibione Casone in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
This guest house features free Wi-Fi throughout and satellite TV in all bedrooms. Gästehaus Kersting is quietly located in the rural area of Nierst, in Meerbusch.

The individually decorated rooms with private entrance have antique English pine furniture. Complimentary toiletries are available in the en-suite bathrooms and a hairdryer is provided.

A buffet-style breakfast of homemade and local produce is served in the hotels dining area. There is a choice of restaurants and supermarkets 2 km away, and guests have use of a refrigerator in the entrance hall.

Gästehaus Kersting lies 1 km from the River Rhine. Meerbusch has many historical buildings including the 800-year-old St Mauritius Church Tower. There is also a ferry connection to the historic Kaiserpfalz Kaiserwerth, 2 km away.

Free parking is available at the guest house and Düsseldorf Airport is a 12-minute drive. The Düsseldorf Messe exhibition centre and Esprit Arena are 10 km away, and the Düsseldorf city centre is 15 km away. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Located in San Giovanni Rotondo, 500 metres from Padre Pio Shrine, La Bella Vista Hotel Ristorante provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Less than 1 km from Casa Sollievo della Sofferenza, the hotel features a garden and a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms provide a garden view and come with a desk and free WiFi.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a balcony with a sea view. Each room includes a private bathroom with a bidet, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at La Bella Vista Hotel Ristorante.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Italian and Polish. Please inform La Bella Vista Hotel Ristorante in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Apartment Thalassa - CAL200 is situated in Calvi. Set on the beachfront, this property has a bar and a garden.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Private parking is available at the apartment.

Cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Aliborni Beach is 2.8 km from Apartment Thalassa - CAL200. The nearest airport is Calvi  Sainte-Catherine Airport, 3 km from the accommodation. Please inform Apartment Thalassa - CAL200 in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A damage deposit of EUR 150 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.
Towels can be rented (reservation needed) at EUR 7.00 per person per stay or guests can bring their own. Bedlinen can be rented (reservation needed) at EUR 7.00 per person per stay or guests can bring their own. 1 Babycot available, free of charge.

Description:
Appartement Barbara is an apartment set in Velden am Wörthersee offering lake and mountain views and situated directly in the center of Velden am Wörthersee in front of the lake and the casino. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

There is a dining area and a kitchen complete with a dishwasher and an oven. Towels and bed linen are provided in this apartment.

Supermarkets, shops, restaurants, bars, bus stops and train stations are reachable within a 5-minute walk.

Velden Christmas Market is reachable within 50 metres. The nearest Klagenfurt Airport is 22 km away. Villach can be reached within 16 km and the Slovenian border is located within 25-minutes drive. Please inform Appartement Barbara in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Featuring mountain views, Blaauwberg House provides accommodation with a patio and a coffee machine, around 200 metres from Blouberg Beach. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi.

The holiday home is equipped with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views.

A barbecue is available on site and fishing can be enjoyed within close proximity of the holiday home.

CTICC is 20 km from Blaauwberg House, while Robben Island Ferry is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Cape Town International, 26 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Blaauwberg House in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Dear Visitor, this region is currently experiencing drought conditions. Please be aware that certain properties are subject to comply with local water usage restrictions.
A damage deposit of ZAR 1500 is required. The host charges this 14 days before arrival. This will be collected by PayPal. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via PayPal, subject to an inspection of the property.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Boasting an outdoor pool, Apart Alto Parana offers self-catering accommodation in Paso de la Patria, only 50 metres from the Casino. The property features a lovely garden and free WiFi access.

Apartments at Apart Alto Parana are fitted with complete bathrooms, fully equipped kitchens, including barbecue facilities, and comfortable seating areas. These simply decorated apartments also feature flat-screen TVs, patios and air conditioning.

Guests staying at the apart will find a solarium and a sun terrace. A wide array of activities can be enjoyed in the surroundings, such as fishing and other water sports. The property also offers free parking, daily maid service and boat storage.

The property is 400 metres from downtown. Resistencia Airport is located 49 km away. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Swimming pool #1 is closed from Fri 31 Mar 2023 until Wed 30 Aug 2023
Please note the based on local tax laws, all Argentinian citizens and resident foreigners must pay an additional fee (VAT) of 21%. Only foreigners who pay with a foreign credit card, debit card or via bank transfer are exempt from this 21% additional fee (VAT) in accommodation and breakfast when presenting a foreign passport or a foreign ID along with a supporting document handed by the national migrations authority, if applicable.
Address: Avenida Cazadores Correntinos 3409 Paso De La Patria

Description:
Located in the centre of Bad Kleinkirchheim, Nordic Lodge offers eight spacious apartments. The spa area includes a sauna and an indoor pool.

The apartments feature a living room with cable TV, a kitchen with a dining area, and bathrooms with separate toilets.

Guests of Nordic Lodge can relax on the sun terrace and use a ski storage room with a ski boot dryer.

Free private parking is available on site. The Kaiserburg ski area is 2 km away and can be reached with a free ski bus stopping 50 metres away.

The St. Kathrein spa centre is 600 metres away, and the Römerbad spa centre is 1 km from the Lodge. Please inform Nordic Lodge in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Hotel ZweiLinden Meckenheim Bonn lies within a Mediterranean-style garden in the Old Town of Meckenheim. Free WiFi is available.

Here you can enjoy a delicious breakfast buffet and enchanting guest rooms a TV, a private bathroom and a balcony or terrace.

The central Neuer Markt Square is a 15-minute walk from Hotel ZweiLinden Meckenheim Bonn. Lüftelberg Castle can be reached in less than 10 minutes drive.

The railway station lies 5 minutes from here, and you can reach Bonn by train in just 18 minutes. Rental bikes are available from the property. Please inform Hotel ZweiLinden Meckenheim Bonn in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

The air-conditioned holiday home consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and free toiletries. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels, Blu-ray player and DVD player, as well as a CD player are provided.

The holiday home offers a barbecue. After a day of hiking, windsurfing or diving, guests can relax in the shared lounge area.

Jeronimos Monastery is 38 km from Casa Papagaios, while Rossio is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, 44 km from the accommodation. Please inform Casa Papagaios in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.
A damage deposit of EUR 100 is required. The host charges this 7 days before arrival. This will be collected by bank transfer. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via bank transfer, subject to an inspection of the property.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Set in Cambrils, within 600 metres of Playa Horta de Santa Maria, Blanco Planet Costa Dorada offers accommodation with free WiFi and air conditioning. Featuring a balcony, the apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, cycling and fishing.

The apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

The nearest airport is Reus, 16 km from the apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Blanco Planet Costa Dorada in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
 A damage deposit of EUR 320 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property.

Description:
Romar Beach 102 is located in Gulf Shores, 3.8 km from Gulf State Park Fishing Pier, 8 km from Alabama Gulf Coast Zoo, as well as 7 km from Waterville USA. The air-conditioned accommodation is 50 metres from Orange Beach, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site.

The holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Orange Beach Welcome Center is 1.4 km from the holiday home. The nearest airport is Pensacola International Airport, 57 km from Romar Beach 102. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Romar Beach 102 in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that the full amount of the reservation is due before arrival. Sugar Sands Realty & Mgmt Inc will send a confirmation with detailed payment information. After full payment is taken, the propertys details, including the address and where to collect keys, will be emailed to you.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note this property will not be rented to anyone under the age of 26.

Description:
Hotel Locanda Le Tre Oche offers rustic-style rooms, a generous buffet breakfast, and a Tyrolean restaurant, all in the heart of Molina di Ledro. The southern shores of Lake Ledro are a 10-minute walk away.

Featuring mountain views and a TV, rooms come with chequered fabrics, and carpeted floors. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer.

You can have dinner in the restaurant, and choose traditional recipes from the à la carte menu. Cold cuts, jams and muesli feature for breakfast. Eggs are prepared on request.

Trekking paths and a tennis court are found 300 metres from Locanda Le Tre Oche. Guests enjoy discounts on massages and beauty treatments at a wellness centre 400 metres away.

Rovereto is 30 km from the hotel. Trento is reachable in 1 hour by car.

Description:
Escape 52 Boutique Apartments offers accommodation in the city center of Ascona. The Lake Maggiore is a 5-minute walk away.

All units come with balcony or terrace. There is a kitchenette, fitted with a dishwasher. An oven, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. Each unit comes with a private bathroom. Towels are available.

Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. The nearest airport is Lugano Airport, 20 km from Escape 52 Boutique Apartments. Please inform Escape 52 Boutique Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
