Description:
This building is a shabby chic boutique hotel designed with a modern French touch style in a charming lace-maker house. My husband and I bought it a few years ago to create our cosy B&B. Looking forward to welcoming you soon, Isabelle and Rénald La Clé dOpale, an elegant B&B in the heart of Calais, offers breakfast included, free WiFi and public parking.

Decorated in a unique style, each room features a private bathroom, desk and seating area with a welcome tray.

You can enjoy a full breakfast included in the rate, every morning in the breakfast room. You can also enjoy a drink at the bar or relax in the veranda with a view of the terrace.

You can enjoy a meal tray on-site upon prior request at the moment of your reservation, or enjoy a meal at one of the nearby restaurants.

A public parking is available nearby, or you also have the possibility to request a private parking for an extra cost. Nearby attractions include the International Institute of Lace and Fashion and the Gambetta Forum, both 10 minutes walk from La Clé dOpale. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that check-in is not possible after 22:00.

Description:
Located directly on the beachfront of Quarteira, Apartamentos Carteia offers self-catering apartments with views of the Atlantic Ocean. The unit features access to an outdoor swimming pool.

The spacious apartments are simply decorated and contain a lounge with a sofa bed, cable TV and balcony. The fully equipped kitchen has a refrigerator, stove, microwave and oven. The bathrooms feature a bath tub.

There are many outdoor activities on offer in the area including fishing, hiking and cycling. The tour desk can help organise excursions and can arrange bicycle and car rental. Guests can also choose to relax on the sun terrace by the pool.

Private parking is available upon request at the Carteia Apartments, and Faro International Airport is only a 30-minute drive away. Vilamoura and the Oceânico Pinhal Golf Course are less than 4 km away. Please inform Apartamentos Carteia in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.
A damage deposit of EUR 200 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform the hotel in advance to arrange check-in.

Please note that guests should inform the property of their flight schedule and arrangements.

Please note that for reservations up to 7 nights, only 1 cleaning and 1 change of towels will be done. For reservations with 8 or more nights 2 cleanings, 2 changes of towels and 1 change of linen will be done. Additional cleaning or change of towels and bed linen will have a surcharge of EUR 15 per service.

Please note that WiFi connection is only available at the reception area.

Please note that all apartments have different furnishings and decor.

Please note the following front desk timetable:

From 1 October until 30 March:
Monday to Friday: 10:00 - 12:30 / 14:30 - 17:00
Saturdays: 10:00 - 12:00
Sunday and Bank Holidays: Closed

From 1 April until 30 September:
All days: 9:30 - 12:30 / 14:30 - 18:00

Guests that have check-in and check-out on days that the front desk is closed, will have their service guaranteed when informed the arrival time in advance. Please contact the property directly.

Cats are not allowed.

The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property. For reservations made by a third party, an alternative payment method will be provided.

Please note that pets are only accepted upon request and at an extra fee of EUR 7 per night. Only small dogs are accepted. Not all the apartments can accommodate pets.
Address: Rua Do Leste, Edifício Carteia, Loja An Edifício CarteiaLoja AN8125-123 Quarteira

This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.
A damage deposit of EUR 200 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
If you expect to arrive outside reception opening hours, please inform the hotel in advance to arrange check-in.

Please note that guests should inform the property of their flight schedule and arrangements.

Please note that for reservations up to 7 nights, only 1 cleaning and 1 change of towels will be done. For reservations with 8 or more nights 2 cleanings, 2 changes of towels and 1 change of linen will be done. Additional cleaning or change of towels and bed linen will have a surcharge of EUR 15 per service.

Please note that WiFi connection is only available at the reception area.

Please note that all apartments have different furnishings and decor.

Please note the following front desk timetable:

From 1 October until 30 March:
Monday to Friday: 10:00 - 12:30 / 14:30 - 17:00
Saturdays: 10:00 - 12:00
Sunday and Bank Holidays: Closed

From 1 April until 30 September:
All days: 9:30 - 12:30 / 14:30 - 18:00

Guests that have check-in and check-out on days that the front desk is closed, will have their service guaranteed when informed the arrival time in advance. Please contact the property directly.

Cats are not allowed.

The name on the credit card used for the booking should correspond to the guest staying at the property. For reservations made by a third party, an alternative payment method will be provided.

Please note that pets are only accepted upon request and at an extra fee of EUR 7 per night. Only small dogs are accepted. Not all the apartments can accommodate pets. Description:
B & B Land of the Sun is located at 2 km of the beautiful valley of the temples at Agrigento an area rich in history and culture, so that UNESCO has named a World Heritage Site. Valley of Temples, Agrigento, collects the old houses of divinity as Juno, Hercules, Zeus, Vulcan and other deities who have lorded it in the classical world.
   Within walking distance of the beautiful seaside resort of San Leone, the most famous and popular beach in the province of Agrigento destination for many tourists and vacationers. Offering garden views, B&B Terra del Sole in San Leone offers accommodation and a garden. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and bidet.

The daily breakfast offers buffet and Italian options.

B&B Terra del Sole offers a terrace.

Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Agrigento is 7 km from the accommodation, while Licata is 41 km away. Please inform B&B Terra del Sole in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
In the small town of Isigny sur Mer, the Hôtel de France, former relay station, is located at the bottom of the bay of Veys 3 km from the sea.

The Hotel de France offers fully equipped and comfortable rooms, with an elegant decoration.

The kitchen prepares food made with fresh produces of the earth and sea, like Isigny oysters, butter and cream cheese, served in the 2 dining rooms.

Hotel de France is in the heart of the historic landing sites from June 1944 and the regional Park des Marais.
Address: 13 Rue Emile Demagny Parc Naturel Régional des Marais du Cotentin et du Bessin14230 Isigny-sur-Mer

Featuring air conditioning, The Silver Beach House offers accommodation in Coeur dAlene.

Description:
Located in Berlins Charlottenburg district, this hotel is just a short walk from the Kurfürstendamm shopping street. It features apartments with fully equipped kitchens and free WiFi.

Kurfürstendamm Underground Station is few minutes away walk from AMC Apartments Kudamm & Bundesallee. Zoologischer Garten Train Station and Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church are few minutes away on foot.

The AMC Apartments Kudamm & Bundesallee include flat-screen TV and a bathroom with hairdryer.

Multiple restaurants, cafés, and nightlife venues can be found in the Kurfürstendamm area. Nearby there are also bakeries and places to have breakfast.

Private parking is available in the on-site Metropole parking garage for an additional charge. Please inform AMC Apartments Kudamm & Bundesallee in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that we only accept digital check-in.
For a faster and more convenient check-in, you will receive an invitation to the PRE-CHECK-IN by e-mail one day before your arrival.
The remaining payment can be made with the usual credit card. For pre-check-in we also accept PayPal, GiroPay and Paydirekt. After successful verification, you will receive an email with the PIN code for access to your apartment on the day of arrival.
Unfortunately, cash payments are not possible.
We dont have a reception.
When booking 6 rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.
Dogs can stay on request for an additional charge of EUR 15 per dog per night.

Description:
Hotel Tschuggen Davos is located in a historical building dating back to 1778, at the foothill of the Flüela Mountain Pass, and it offers free WiFi in all areas, free private parking and free ski storage. The Tschuggen Bus, which is only active in summer, stops directly at the hotel.

The rooms at Damiano´s come with wooden furniture, carpeted floors and private or shared bathrooms. A sun terrace with splendid views of the Swiss Alps is also available at the property.

Every day, guests at Damiano´s Gasthaus can enjoy a breakfast buffet. An à la carte restaurant can be found on-site as well, serving regional Swiss cuisine.

Davoss centre is 7 km away and the cable car to Pischa Ski Resort can be reached within a 2-minute drive. The Davos Conference Centre is a 15-minute drive away. Please note that the restaurant is closed on Wednesdays.

Please note that half board can only be booked when making a reservation of minimum 3 nights.

Please also note that due to the property´s location on a mountain pass, the WiFi connection might experience minor interruptions.

Description:
Offering a free outdoor pool and a furnished garden, Bellavigna Country House is less than 2 km from Montefalcione centre. It offers free Wi-Fi  and classic-style rooms with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Rooms at the Bellavigna Country House will provide you with an electric kettle, a desk and a safe. Some rooms are equipped with a balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

An Italian breakfast of croissants and cappuccino is provided daily. Served buffet style, guests can enjoy it in the dining room.

The Amalfi Coast is 70 km from the property, while Lake Laceno is reachable by car in 30 minutes. Naples is a 1-hour drive away. Please note that the pool is open from 18 June until 8 September.

Towels change, turndown service and cleaning are performed every 3 days. Bed linen are changed every 6 days.

Description:
Located in Seville, 1 km from Santa María La Blanca Church, Ibis Styles Sevilla City Santa Justa provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a bar. With an outdoor swimming pool, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a kids club, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests.

All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The rooms include a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Ibis Styles Sevilla City Santa Justa offers a childrens playground. You can play table tennis at this 3-star hotel.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Alcazar Palace, La Giralda and Sevilla Cathedral and Santa Justa Train Station. The nearest airport is Seville Airport, 10 km from Ibis Styles Sevilla City Santa Justa.

Description:
Situated in Warth am Arlberg, 26 km from Train Station Sankt Anton am Arlberg, Berghotel Biberkopf features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna and a hot tub. Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, the allergy-free hotel has a spa centre.

At the hotel the rooms have a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Berghotel Biberkopf offers some units that have a balcony, and every room has a coffee machine. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options.

The area is popular for hiking and skiing, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel.

The nearest airport is St. Gallen-Altenrhein Airport, 101 km from Berghotel Biberkopf. Please inform Berghotel Biberkopf in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Carland Cross is located in central Cornwall and within a mile of the village of Mitchell. The major A30 road, which links Exeter to Penzance, runs directly past the property. Free Hotspot depending on signal and free private parking are available.

Bedrooms within the Carland have wooden fittings and a real leather double bed. Tea and coffee are available in each room as well as a flat-screen TV with Freeview. The en suite bathroom features a heated towel rail and a shower with monsoon shower head.

The seaside towns of Newquay and Perrenporth are located 7 miles north of the property and Newquay Airport is less than 15 miles away. Only 7 miles south lies the cathedral city of Truro and the popular Eden Project, a large selection of greenhouses and botanical gardens, is 18 miles away. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please inform Carland Cross in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Situated in Tavira, 750 metres from Cabanas Beach, 2.9 km from Praia da Ilha de Tavira and 13 km from Island of Tavira, CIP T2 Cabanas features accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This apartment is 7 km from Roman Bridge of Tavira and 9 km from Castle of Tavira.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with pool views.

The apartment offers a terrace. An outdoor swimming pool is available on site and hiking can be enjoyed within close proximity of CIP T2 Cabanas.

Tavira Gran Plaza Shopping Centre is 5 km from the accommodation, while Pego do Inferno Waterfall is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Faro, 46 km from CIP T2 Cabanas, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform CIP T2 Cabanas in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
 A damage deposit of EUR 250 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
Situated in Trujillo, 2.8 km from Mayorazgo de Facalá House, Tang Hotel offers accommodation with a shared lounge. 2.8 km from Trujillo Municipality, the property is also 2.9 km away from Archeology Museum. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a TV. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom. Guest rooms include a desk.

Guests at Tang Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Trujillo Main Square is 2.9 km from the accommodation. Cap. FAP Carlos Martínez de Pinillos International Airport is 11 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Based on local tax laws, Peruvian citizens (and foreigners staying more than 59 days in Peru) must pay an additional fee of 18% .To be exempt from this 18% additional fee (IVA), a copy of the immigration card and passport must be presented.

Please note both documents are required for fee exemption. Guests who are not able to present both documents will be required to pay the fee.

Foreign business travellers who require a printed invoice, will also be charged the additional 18% regardless of the length of their stay in Peru. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.
Address: Av. Prolongacion Juan Pablo Ii Mz. W3 Lote 8. San Andres Quinta Etapa. Mz. W3Urbanizacion San Andrés V EtapaVictor Larco Herrera

Description:
Located in Münster, 700 metres from Münster Central Station, B&B Hotel Münster-Hafen provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 1.8 km from Münster Cathedral, 2.8 km from Schloss Münster and 2.8 km from Muenster Botanical Garden. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Congress Centre Hall Muensterland.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available daily at B&B Hotel Münster-Hafen.

University of Münster is 3.2 km from the accommodation, while LWL Museum of Natural History is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Munster Osnabruck International Airport, 26 km from B&B Hotel Münster-Hafen. Please note that the reception is open between 06:00 and 23:00 from Mondays to Fridays.  The reception is open between 07:00 and 12:00 and then between 17:00 and 22:00 on Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays.  Check-in is also possible outside reception opening times using the automatic check-in facility.  However, cash payment is not possible outside reception opening hours. When booking more than 4 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Description: HeadLine : Near Sanur Beach  Location : When you stay at Kejora Villas Suites in Denpasar, you ll be on the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Sanur Beach and Kuta Beach.  This beach villa is 9.7 mi (15.6 km) from Seminyak Beach and 8 mi (12.8 km) from Waterbom Bali.  Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 8 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and ovens. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided daily.  Dining : For lunch or dinner, stop by THE GLASS HOUSE, a restaurant that specializes in Indonesian cuisine. You can also grab snacks at the coffee shop/cafe. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 11 AM for a fee.  Renovations : In accordance with local regulations, all visitors must remain within the property during Seclusion Day (Nyepi)/Hindu New Year for a 24-hour period (starting at 6 AM). Seclusion Day typically falls in March or April (dates subject to change each year). Check-in and check-out will not be possible on that date. Ngurah Rai Airport (Bali International Airport) is also closed on Seclusion Day. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.
Address: Jl . Danau Tamblingan No. 25 Sanur SanurBali

Description:
Featuring sea views, Abahana Villas Chill Out provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace, around 1.4 km from Arenal Bol Beach. This villa has a private pool, a garden, barbecue facilities, free WiFi and free private parking.

The villa features 4 bedrooms, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 3 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided.

The nearest airport is Alicante Airport, 76 km from the villa. Please note that the check-in and key-collection take place at: Avda.Jaime I el Conquistador, 31 Edif.El Alamo bajo, 3710 Calpe.
Please inform Abahana Villas Chill Out in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that the full amount of the reservation is due before arrival. Abahana Villas will send a confirmation with detailed payment information. After full payment is taken, the propertys details, including the address and where to collect keys, will be emailed to you.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
 A damage deposit of EUR 700 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 7 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
Please note that late check-in after 20:00 carries a EUR 50 surcharge

Description:
Brindhavan Residency is located in Karaikkudi. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. All units include a safety deposit box.

A vegetarian breakfast is available daily at Brindhavan Residency. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Indian cuisine. A vegetarian option can also be requested.

The nearest airport is Tiruchirappalli International Airport, 87 km from Brindhavan Residency. Please inform Brindhavan Residency in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
It is possible to extend your stay at this property at no extra cost for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes, with a maximum limit of 10 extra days.
Medical monitoring is available for guests quarantined due to Coronavirus (COVID-19). This may be provided in person or virtually, depending on the property type and location.
Address: Plot No. 46 & 47 Vaikasi Street Kannadasan Nagar Kannadasan NagarKaraikudi 630003

Description:

Congress Centre darmstadtium is 47 km from the apartment, while Darmstadt Central Station is 49 km away. The nearest airport is Mannheim City Airport, 60 km from Ferienhaus Kaffenberger. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

The holiday home has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 3 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in this accommodation.

Orange Beach Waterfront Park is 4.4 km from the holiday home, while The Wharf Amphitheatre is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Pensacola International Airport, 44 km from Turquoise Place Unit 1008D. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Turquoise Place Unit 1008D in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that the full amount of the reservation is due before arrival. White Shores Realty, LLC will send a confirmation with detailed payment information. After full payment is taken, the propertys details, including the address and where to collect keys, will be emailed to you.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description: Stop at Dianah Cottages to discover the wonders of Bohol. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer are there for guest's enjoyment. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access  wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, desk. Access to the hotel's outdoor pool, massage, garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Bohol has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Dianah Cottages.

Description:
Offering charming, individually decorated rooms, El Quesar de Gamoneo offers views of the mountains surrounding Gamoneo de Cangas. It features a restaurant and a peaceful setting, ideal for hiking.

Each attractive room at El Quesar de Gamoneo has rustic décor and overlooks the surrounding countryside. There is free Wi-Fi, a TV and a private bathroom.

The property produces its own Gamoneo-style cheese and offers guests the chance to take part in cheese-making classes. It also organises hiking trips in the surrounding hills.

Guests can enjoy local, mountain cuisine in the Gamoneos restaurant. There is also a lounge and a terrace with great views.

The historic town of Cangas de Onís is 20 km from the hotel. The neighbouring village of Llano de Con is 6 km away, while Benia de Onís is 10 km away. Please inform El Quesar de Gamoneo in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.
Piscina n.º 1 is closed from Sun 18 Sept 2022 until Thu 15 Jun 2023

Located nearby to Stow on the Wold, The Horse & Groom has a restaurant, bar, garden, and free WiFi. Private parking is provided to guests free of charge.

At the inn, each room includes a wardrobe. At The Horse & Groom all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A full breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

The Horse & Groom offers a terrace.

Stratford-upon-Avon is 38 km from the inn, while Cheltenham is 33 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gloucestershire Airport, 41 km from The Horse & Groom. Please inform The Horse & Groom in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
It is not possible to stay at this property for Coronavirus (COVID-19) quarantine purposes.

Description:
Marina Apartments & Studios is located in Farsa Village, where the modern homes stand next to the ruins of the old village which was destroyed by the earthquake of 1953. The property is very close to Argostoli, the capital of the island and only five minutes walking distance from Ligia Beach. It consists of three apartments and one studio with sea and mountain view that can accommodate from two to five guests, all with the basic amenities in order to spend your holidays in a peaceful and relaxing environment.

Walking in the complex, you will find a lavish garden with barbecue and a private parking. The apartment can accommodate up to five guests. It consists of one double bed, one single bed and a sofa bed. In the same complex you will find one apartment for up to 4 guests (2 adults and 2 children or 3 adults) with a double bed and a sofa bed and one studio for 2 guests with a double bed. A few metres away you will find one independent apartment (Villetta) for up to 4 guests (2 adults and 2 children or 3 adults) with a double bed and a sofa bed.

Description:
Located in Central Okeechobee, this pet-friendly hotel offers guests free Wi-Fi. Fishing and other water recreation sports of Lake Okeechobee are less than 10 minutes drive away.

A microwave and a small refrigerator are found in each simply decorated room at the Economy Inn Okeechobee. All rooms are also equipped with cable TV and a work desk.

Guests can enjoy a refreshing beverage from the on-site vending machines. A 24- hour reception and air conditioning are provided for added convenience.

The Taylor Creek Nubbins Slough Conservation Area is 5 minutes drive away. Paradise Run is 12 miles from the hotel. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Apartment Bella Vista is situated in Cap dAgde. The 4-star apartment is 1.3 km from Richelieu Beach.

The apartment features 3 bedrooms, a kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, and 2 bathrooms with a shower, a hairdryer and a washing machine. Featuring free private parking, this 4-star apartment also features free WiFi throughout the property.

Rochelongue is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Plage de la Baie de lAmitie is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Beziers Cap dAgde Airport, 15 km from Apartment Bella Vista. Please inform Apartment Bella Vista by Interhome in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note that the full amount of the reservation is due before arrival. Interhome will send a confirmation with detailed payment information. After full payment is taken, the propertys details, including the address and where to collect keys, will be emailed to you.
A damage deposit of EUR 700 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
1 Babycot available, charges apply.
Address: Cap D'agde Rue Volvire De Brassac 34300

Description:
The well-priced Hotel Laberinto can be found in the centre of Sigüenza, next to the Alameda Park. It offers air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

All of the rooms in the Laberinto have full private bathroom, TV, telephone and heating.

There is also a restaurant for the exclusive use of guests, serving a range of local and Spanish dishes.

The area has a good choice of bars and restaurants. Sigüenza Cathedral is about 250 metres away, while the station is about 5 minutes walk away.

Description:
Situated in Iglesias, 500 metres from Iglesias and 7.4 km from Monteponi, La Casa Di Amy features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a garden and barbecue facilities. The property has city and mountain views, and is 8.7 km from San Benedetto.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with garden views. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

The apartment offers a terrace.

Gonnesa is 10 km from La Casa Di Amy, while Villamassargia is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cagliari Elmas, 51 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform La Casa Di Amy in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Managed by a private host

Description: Kerong Cottage Bed and Breakfast ~ circa 1857 ~ touch your heritage and enrich your life... Heritage listed sandstone cottage. Kerong was built in 1857 by Matthew Longwill (architect and stonemason of prominent Warwick buildings)and a copy of this original (NSW) title is on display. Warwick's famous artist Mary Dau lived here as she recorded and published sketches of the area's heritage buildings.

Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.  Dining : Satisfy your appetite at the hotel s coffee shop/cafe, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Description:
Haus Bethania FeWo medio - 69106 is located in Bad Kissingen and offers a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring free private parking, the apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking and fishing.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a TV and a kitchenette with a fridge and oven. Towels and bed linen are provided.

The nearest airport is Erfurt-Weimar Airport, 140 km from the apartment. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a spa and wellness centre, Mansión Los Guichos is located 1 km from Santa Cruz Muluá. Free WiFi access is available in some rooms.

Each room here will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and cable channels. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. You can enjoy garden view from the room. Extras include a safety deposit box and bed linen.

At Mansión Los Guichos you will find a restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities, a shared lounge and a tour desk. Temazcal treatments are available.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including hiking.

This property is 2 km from Xetulul Water Park and 10 km from Retalhuleu city centre. Guatemala International Airport is 180 km away. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please inform Mansión Los Guichos in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please note food service in the restaurant starts at 6:00 am.

Description: HeadLine : Near Parco Belvedere Lama  Location : Located in Monopoli, Il Melograno is in a rural location, a 5-minute drive from Parco Belvedere Lama and 5 minutes from Lido Bianco.  This 5-star hotel is 11.5 mi (18.5 km) from Trulli of Alberobello and 12.2 mi (19.7 km) from Zoosafari.  Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 40 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.  Dining : Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Mummùlo, a restaurant which specializes in local and international cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM.  Renovations : The property is closed between November 10 and May 20. Description:
Haflingerhof Frühboden offers you accommodation on a horse ranch in Egg/Schwyz, 29 km from Zürich. There is a rustic restaurant on site serving local cuisine.

You can find Haflinger horses, ponies, donkes, sheep, goats and cats on site.

The area is great for horse riding, hiking, cycling, skiing, fishing and surfing. The Einsiedeln Monastery is just 7 km away. Please inform Haflingerhof Frühboden in advance of your expected arrival time. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description: Conveniently located in the heart of Seoul, within easy reach of the entertainment hub of Shinchon with its lively bars and fine dining, this modern hotel is ideal for holiday makers and business travellers alike. The shopping and entertainment districts of Myeondong and Insadong are just 20 minutes by car. Shinchon Metro station is just 300 metres away and Inceon International Airport is also within easy reach. Travellers will find spacious rooms with a crisp contemporary feel. All feature air conditioning and wooden flooring and their own unique décor as well as flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. All rooms also feature a spa bath and free Internet. Free snacks and drinks are available at the front desk and Korean, Asian and European dining options are available just a three minute walk away. The hotel also has a small business area with fax and copy services.

Description:
A fully equipped apartment in the heart of Santiago, Chilean Suite Centro features free Wi-Fi, a gym and BBQ facilities. The Paris-Londres neighbourhood lies 10 metres from the property.

The bedroom is bright and contemporary. It has stylish wooden furniture. The apartment boasts wooden floors and large windows. It comprises a private bathroom, fully equipped kitchen and TV. There is heating and a balcony too.

Guests can make the most of 24-hour front desk assistance. The building contains a lift. There is an onsite laundry room available to use.

Chilean Suite Centro is 200 metres away from Universidad de Chile metro station. Santa Lucía Hill is located 600 metres away. Please inform Chilean Suites Centro in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A deposit via bank wire is required to secure your reservation. The hotel will contact you after booking to provide bank wire instructions.

All Chilean citizens, resident foreigners and foreigners must pay an additional fee (IVA) of 19%. Rates and additional fees must be paid in local currency.
This additional fee (IVA) is not included in the hotel rates.
Address: Padre Alonso de Ovalle 868 8330182 SantiagoMetropolitan Region

Description:
Living 2000 offers self-catering apartments in the very centre of Moena, surrounded by all services. The area is ideal for hiking, biking and skiing activities. Ski storage is provided on site.

With a washing machine and TV, the Living 2000 apartments are fully equipped. Each consists of 1 or 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, and a living room with kitchenette and dining area.

Guests can reach the Trevalle ski area in 10 minutes, with a ski bus stopping 50 metres from the property. Trento and Canazei can also be reached by bus, and the bus stop is 300 metres away. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Please inform Moena Appartamenti in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Check-in takes place in our office in Strada de Ischiacia, 15, 38035, Moena. Check-in from 15.00 to 19.00. Check-out from 09:00 to 10.00.

The apartment includes a bedroom, a living room with a flat-screen TV, an open-space kitchen with a dining table, and a bathroom fitted with a corner bath and free toiletries.

The Stadtpark can be found within 500 metres. The Hofburg is 1.7 km away. Museumsquartier can be reached within 2 km. Please inform Apartment Domino in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties. Description:
Only 150 metres from the beach, Hotel del Mar offers cozy rooms with a chic décor in Valeria del Mar. Free WiFi access is available in all areas and a full breakfast is served daily, including coffee, tea, milk, hot mate infusion, croissants, toast, butter, jam, honey, dulce de leche, and gluten-free options.

Rooms at Hotel del Mar feature a lively design with chic details. All of them include sommier beds, 39" LCD TVs with TDA (open digital television) and safety deposit boxes. Some rooms also offer a terraced balcony. Prepaid Direct TV is available.

Guests can enjoy the propertys outdoor barbecue facilities. There is also a shared lounge and the front desk can give helpful information for getting around the area. Parking is available for a surcharge.

Pinamar Bus Terminal is 4 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.
Please note the based on local tax laws, all Argentinian citizens and resident foreigners must pay an additional fee (VAT) of 21%. Only foreigners who pay with a foreign credit card, debit card or via bank transfer are exempt from this 21% additional fee (VAT) in accommodation and breakfast when presenting a foreign passport or a foreign ID along with a supporting document handed by the national migrations authority, if applicable.
Address: Avenida Coronel de Marina JB Azopardo 38 7167 Valeria del Mar

Description:
Conveniently located in the outskirts of Gastouri, Niki Studios allow easy access to Corfus beaches and archaeological sites.

Surrounded by a beautiful garden, Niki Studios consists of 8 studios and 3 apartments. All units are equipped with a kitchen and have a balcony with wonderful views to the Ionian Sea.

Centrally located in the complex, is a large swimming pool with sun beds and umbrellas. The pool area offers a bar serving beverages and a recreation area. Please inform Niki Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Guests are encouraged to have their own vehicle.

Description: HeadLine : Near Sanur Beach  Location : When you stay at Bahagia Villas in Denpasar, you ll be near the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Sanur Beach and Kuta Beach.  This villa is 8.6 mi (13.8 km) from Seminyak Beach and 6.8 mi (11 km) from Waterbom Bali.  Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring private pools and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Rooms have private patios. Kitchens are outfitted with full-sized refrigerators/freezers, stovetops, and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment.  Dining : Take advantage of the villa s room service (during limited hours). Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.  Renovations : In accordance with local regulations, all visitors must remain within the property during Seclusion Day (Nyepi)/Hindu New Year for a 24-hour period (starting at 6 AM). Seclusion Day typically falls in March or April (dates subject to change each year). Check-in and check-out will not be possible on that date. Ngurah Rai Airport (Bali International Airport) is also closed on Seclusion Day. Guests must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
Located in Gulf Shores, a few steps from Gulf Shores Public Beach and 3.6 km from Alabama Gulf Coast Zoo, Tropical Winds 304 Condo offers air conditioning. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi.

Featuring a DVD player, the apartment has a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a fridge, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 3 bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms with a shower and a bath. A TV with satellite channels is provided.

Gulf State Park Fishing Pier is 5 km from the apartment, while Waterville USA is 3.2 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Guests must be 25 years of age or older to check-in and must be staying at the property.

Description:
Boasting a private beach area, 2.3 km from Nai Harn Beach. Providing a restaurant, the property also has an outdoor swimming pool. Windmill Viewpoint is 2.4 km away and Promthep Cape is 3 km from the resort.

Guest rooms in the resort are equipped with a kettle. Every room is equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms are equipped with a terrace. At Cruiser Island Resort rooms are equipped with a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Tesco Lotus at Park Rawai is 4.4 km from Cruiser Island Resort. Phuket International Airport is 37 km away. Please inform Cruiser Island Resort in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
The resort is located on a sub-island, and there is a boat transfer fee of THB 500 per person for a round-trip.

Description:
Situated in the Las Condes district in Santiago, Bed and Breakfast Manque offers accommodation only 300 mts from Manquehue subway station. Free WiFi available and private parking on site.

Some rooms have a flat-screen TV. There are private and shared bathrooms. A small complimentary breakfast is served. There is an outdoor pool available in the garden.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

Parque Arauco shopping centre is 1.7 km from the property, offering a variety of restaurants and retail stores. Santiago International Airport is 25 km from the property. Please inform Bed and Breakfast Manque in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Please note the property requires a deposit to guarantee reservation.

Description:
An outdoor swimming pool with a sun deck area can be enjoyed just a 10-minute drive from Puerto Iguazus commercial area. There is chic décor, wooden pathways in the forest and free Wi-Fi in common areas.

Tierra Guarani Lodge has air-conditioned rooms with chic décor and cable TV. All rooms have private bathrooms. Some rooms feature spacious balconies with direct forest views.

A full buffet breakfast with tropical fruits can be enjoyed in the room or in the poolside sun loungers, at Tierra Guarani.

Puerto Iguazus main bus station is a 10-minute drive and the International Airport is 18 km from the lodge. Car rental and private parking are available. Please inform Tierra Guaraní Lodge in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Please note the based on local tax laws, all Argentinian citizens and resident foreigners must pay an additional fee (VAT) of 21%. Only foreigners who pay with a foreign credit card, debit card or via bank transfer are exempt from this 21% additional fee (VAT) in accommodation and breakfast when presenting a foreign passport or a foreign ID along with a supporting document handed by the national migrations authority, if applicable.

This accommodation is registered as a provider of the Pre Trip Program (Programa Previaje) of the Argentinian Ministry of Tourism and Sports (CUIT: 20-21618408-5)
Address: Selva Iryapu 600Has 3370 Misones 600 Hectares3370 Puerto Iguazú

Description:
3.4 km from Villa Isola, Concordia Hotel is set in Bandung and provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Well located in the Ciumbuleuit district, this hotel features a tennis court. The property offers an outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk.

At the hotel, each room includes a wardrobe. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. The rooms in Concordia Hotel are equipped with a TV and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. The on-site restaurant serves international cuisine.

The property has a fitness centre.

Description:
White Rose Cottage, a property with a tennis court, is set in Filey, less than 1 km from Hunmanby Gap Beach, 2.2 km from Muston Sands Beach, as well as 2.5 km from Reighton Sands Beach. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and private parking is available on site.

The holiday home features 2 bedrooms, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Guests can swim in the indoor pool, go cycling, or relax in the garden and use the barbecue facilities.

The Spa Scarborough is 15 km from the holiday home, while Peasholm Park is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Humberside Airport, 86 km from White Rose Cottage. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
One well behaved dog welcome

Description:
Tresor Sousouras (ex.Hanioti Palace) is located in the beautiful and green Kassandra Peninsula, only 60 minutes away from Thessaloniki, in the picturesque resort of Hanioti, which is a small picturesque paradise, that has been designed to cater for the needs of even the most discerning traveller and guarantee a relaxing and memorable stay. The village features numerous restaurants and traditional taverns that will satisfy every family, as well as modern bars and dance-clubs geared to providing evening entertainment to all age-groups. Hanioti Palace Hotel offers luxury, turning your holidays into an unforgettable experience, inside the unique harmony of the forest and the sea. The hotel consists of 4 traditional complexes of rooms and apartments and is only 250 meters from the beach, which is awarded the E.C.C. Blue Flag. Greece/Halkidiki/HaniotiPal/main.jpg

At the central complex you will find bar and the restaurant of the hotel, where you can enjoy a refreshing drink or a delicious meal, served by efficient and always friendly staff. At the reception department, you can get all the information you need about Hanioti, rent a car for an excursion to nearby villages, and take advantage of other services offered, such as a safe boxes and exchange. Other facilities include Cafeteria, Swimming pool, Mini market, Water sports, Beach snack bar, Childrens playground and Parking.

All rooms are comfortably furnished and feature bathroom, A/C (July-August), radio, sat TV, fridge and safe deposit boxes (on extra payment), direct dial telephone, hair dryer, balcony or terrace, all with pool view.

Description:
Situated in Montreux on the Swiss riviera, Villa Kruger Boutique B&B is located directly on Lake Leman, amidst a 1000 m2 private garden with direct lake access, several terraces and balconies.

The Montreux Music & Convention Centre is 1.3 km from the property, while Geneva International Airport is 64 km away. Please inform Villa Kruger Boutique Hotel B&B in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Hotel Shpella is a 2-star property located in Berat. With a bar, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides luggage storage space, and currency exchange for guests.

Description:
This Historic Ashford Lodge features a restaurant, fireplace and free Wi-Fi. The entrance to Mt. Rainer National Park is 10 minutes walk away.

 Each of the units in the main building is unique, and all rooms offer cable TV, a coffee maker, WiFi, toiletries, Google mini, and daily housekeeping.

Nearby nature trails lead to Gifford Pinchot National Forest. Local artisan gifts are featured in the gift shop onsite.

Pioneer Farm Museum is 40 minutes drive away. Mt. Rainier Gondola is 100 km away from Alexanders Lodge. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property has reduced reception and service operating hours.
Please Note: Only some units are pet-friendly. Please contact property for full pet policy.

Please note: The complimentary breakfast is for lodge guests only, NOT for the Chalet Rental Homes and Summit Suites at Forest House - they are equipped with full kitchens.

Description: Property Location With a stay at Echo Valley Ranch And Spa in Jesmond, you''ll be connected to the airport and within the region of Big Bar Lake Provincial Park.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 20 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You''re sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include concierge services, supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.Dining Satisfy your appetite at the resort''s restaurant, where you can enjoy drinks at a bar, take in a garden view, and even dine alfresco weather permitting. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/cafe. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Jesmond? This resort has facilities measuring 279 square feet 25 square meters, including meeting rooms. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge available on request, and free self parking is available onsite.

Description:
Situated in Nice city centre, 10 minutes walk from the beach, this hotel offers individually decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV. Free newspapers are at your disposal.

With a simple but atmospheric décor, rooms at Hôtel Wilson can have private or shared bathroom and include a desk, a wardrobe and a TV. Some rooms open onto a balcony overlooking Nices rooftops.

A continental breakfast is served daily in the hotels dining room, but you can also request it in the comfort of your room.

In the surrounding area you will find many bars, restaurants and shops and the famous Promenade des Anglais is only 800 metres away. Nice Train Station is a 16-minute walk.

Description:
Situated right on the sea coast of Durres and near all major sites, Hotel Ani offers air-conditioned rooms and unique views of the Adriatic sea. It features an a-la-carte restaurant and a bar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.
All rooms are brightly furnished and offer a flat-screen TV, a phone and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a spa bath, while some are fitted with a shower.
The hotel also features a conference room, while the restaurant offers a rich menu featuring Italian, French and traditional Albanian cuisine. The restaurant also offers a terrace, while the front desk is open 24 hours a day. Parking is also offered. The guests can either enjoy a walk along the seaside or visit the historical sites like Amphitheater and Archaeology museum. Hotel Ani is located right next to the sandy beach strip that stretches over 20 km. The city of Tirana can be reached in 35 km, while Tirana Airport is 20 km away.The HOTEL ANI is a  hotel. Located in DURRES area.

Description:
Situated in Santiago in the Metropolitan Region region, Apartments "Deparent" has a balcony. This property offers access to a patio, free private parking and free WiFi.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a kettle, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is available.

A terrace is available for guests at the apartment to use.

Parque Araucano is 2.3 km from Apartments "Deparent", while Costanera Center is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santiago International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation. Please inform Apartments "Deparent" in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests with tattoos may not be permitted to use the propertys public bathing areas or other facilities where the tattoos might be visible to other guests.
All Chilean citizens, resident foreigners and foreigners must pay an additional fee (IVA) of 19%. Rates and additional fees must be paid in local currency.
This additional fee (IVA) is not included in the property rates.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Located directly on the Aasee Lake, the Jugendgästehaus Aasee provides a rich buffet breakfast and free WiFi in public areas. It also has a 24-hour front desk and a sunny terrace whereas the Old Town district is only 800 metres away.

All the modern rooms at Jugendgästehaus Aasee include a private bathroom. Twin rooms also include a TV.

The Jugendgästehaus Aasee offers a small library, a games console and a variety of board games. Table tennis facilities are also available.

This hostel is ideally located for sightseeing, with sights such as St Pauls Cathedral and Münster Zoo within 2.5 km. In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
German guests require a membership card for the German Youth Hostel Association, which can be purchased at reception. International guests receive a free Welcome Stamp.

A free trial membership is also available to German guests.

Description:
Located 6 km from Rio Cuarto Airport and 1 km from Rio Cuarto Bus Station, Apart Loft 216 offers accommodation in Río Cuarto. Private parking is available on site.

The kitchenette is equipped with a microwave. A flat-screen TV is featured.

You can play tennis and billiards at the property, and car hire is available. Guests can use the on site hot tub for a surcharge.

Downtown Rio Cuarto is 500 metres from Apart Loft 216. Please inform Apart Loft 216 in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please note that the hot tub is available for 20 USD per day.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace, Villa Lourenco is situated in the Sesmarias district of Albufeira, only 1.3 km from Castelo Beach. This villa features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi.

The villa features 3 bedrooms, a kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, and 2 bathrooms with a shower, a hairdryer and a washing machine. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

The villa provides a barbecue.

Popular points of interest near Villa Lourenco include Praia da Maré das Porcas, Fraternidade Beach and Praia da Coelha. The nearest airport is Faro Airport, 49 km from the accommodation. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer in each unit, along with free toiletries.

Description: HeadLine : In Milan (Turro)  Location : With a stay at UNAWAY Hotel & Residence Linea Uno Milano in Milan (Turro), you ll be within a 5-minute drive of Piazzale Loreto and Piazza della Repubblica.  This 4-star residence is 3.1 mi (4.9 km) from Teatro alla Scala and 3.2 mi (5.1 km) from Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II.  Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 98 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).  Dining : Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.  Renovations : The following facilities are closed until further notice: Breakfast  CheckIn Instructions : Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.The property is professionally cleaned; disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F.Contactless check-out is available.The property affirms that it follows sanitization practices of Safe Hospitality National Protocol (Italy) guidelines.  Special Instructions : Guests will receive an email with check-in instructions prior to arrival. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
The Impero is set in the medieval heart of Cremona, 50 metres from Piazza del Duomo and from the new underground parking in Piazza Marconi. The elegant rooms offer an LCD TV with Sky channels and a great view of the Cathedral.
Completely renovated 4th floor, design rooms with modern furniture and complete with every comfort.

The rooms are air-conditioned and classically furnished with parquet floors. Free WiFi is available. Some include free tea and coffee making facilities.

Buffet breakfast is available daily. Guests can also enjoy happy hour and drinks at the partner bar Hobos.

Cremona Hotels Impero is set in a pedestrian area, 100 metres from the Museum of Violin. Cremonas Torrazzo and the best restaurants and bars of the historic centre are within easy reach. Private parking spaces located 50 metres away can be rented at reception.

Every Wednesday and Saturday a typical open-air market takes place in the street in front of the Impero. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Hotel Impero in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
The hotel is located in a restricted traffic zone. Guests arriving by car should give their registration number to staff at reception upon arrival.

Please use the Special Requests box to book the airport shuttle service.

Guests can drive to the hotel for check-in and check-out only. Please note on Wednesday and Saturday vehicle access is not possible until after 14:30.

Please note that the air-conditioning is only available for a surcharge.

Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Central offers accommodation in Trujillo, 100 metres from Archeology Museum. Free parking off-site and WiFi are available .

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, a flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

Guests at Hotel Central will find a 24-hour front desk, touristic information, luggage storage and continental breakfast.

There is private parking about 1 block away from the hotel.

Trujillo Main Square is 300 metres from Hotel Central, while Trujillo City Cathedral is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Cap. FAP Carlos Martínez de Pinillos International Airport, 10 km from the property. Please inform Hotel Central in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Note that parking is only available from 9:00 to 20:00.

There is no elevator.

Based on local tax laws, Peruvian citizens (and foreigners staying more than 59 days in Peru) must pay an additional fee of 18%.

To be exempt from this 18% additional fee (IVA), a copy of the immigration card and passport must be presented.

Please note both documents are required for fee exemption. Guests who are not able to present both documents will be required to pay the fee.

Foreign business travellers who require a printed invoice, will also be charged the additional 18% regardless of the length of their stay in Peru. This fee is not automatically calculated in the total costs for the reservation.

Description:
Just 3 minutes drive from Praia Grande, Oceano offers panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Serra de Sintra. The property is a 15-minute drive from the Sintra centre, famed for its palaces and monuments.

Each room at the Hotel Oceano includes a sofa bed and a cable TV. The rooms are decorated with wooden furniture and colourful bedspreads. All are fitted with heating and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet-style breakfast is served daily. Light snacks and drinks are offered at the snack bar. Room service, including breakfast, is also available.

Guests can rent a car at Oceano. Cascais is 21 km away, while Estoril is within 23 km. Lisbons centre is at a 40 km distance and Humberto Delgado International Airport is a 42-minute drive away.

The property was recently renovated. Please inform WOT Sintra Ocean in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.
Prices shown are for individual bookings only. When booking 10 rooms or more, different policies and supplements may apply.
When travelling with pets, please note that an extra charge of 15 EUR per pet, per night applies. Please note that a maximum of 1 pet is allowed per room (contact the property for more details).
Address: Avenida Eugene Levy50 52 Praia Das Macas Colares Praia das Macas2705-304 ColaresSintra

Description:
Set in Bloemfontein, 3.2 km from Oliewenhuis Art Gallery, De Witte Guest House offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. Located around 27 km from Boyden Observatory, the guest house with free WiFi is also 2.7 km away from Preller Square. Guests can enjoy garden views.

At the guest house, rooms come with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at De Witte Guest House have a TV and air conditioning, and some rooms come with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at De Witte Guest House.

National Museum Bloemfontein is 4.1 km from the guest house, while Gallery On Leviseur Bloemfontein is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Bram Fischer International Airport, 9 km from De Witte Guest House. Managed by a private host

Description:
Situated in Calan Bosch, Clavel features accommodation with a private pool and free WiFi. Set 1.7 km from Cala en Bosch Beach, the property offers a terrace and free private parking.

The air-conditioned villa consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hairdryer.

Son Xoriguer Beach is 2.7 km from the villa, while Mount Toro is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Menorca Airport, 54 km from Clavel. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Located in the centre of Andalo, Residence Alba Nova is only 350 metres from the Paganella 2001 ski resort. It features mountain-style apartments with a balcony, and offers a discount card for services.

Apartments come with a fully equipped kitchenette, a dining/seating area with flat-screen TV, and an en suite bathroom. Each has Wi-Fi access, wooden furnishings and tiled floors.

Alba Nova Residence provides guests with an Andalo Card offering discounts to the local wellness and sporting centres, and discounts on public transport, museums and ski lessons.

The property is a 5-minute drive from Lake Molveno, and 33 km from Trento. A bus stops 500 metres from apartments, and links with the city of Molveno and Mezzocorona Train Station.

The residence is complete with a sun terrace, a childrens playground, and free private parking. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:
Located 450 metres away from Ostravices Railway Station, Hotel Odra offers a wellness centre and an indoor pool looking out to the garden. Facilities include a tennis court and a restaurant.

All rooms at Odra Hotel have TV sets, radios and bathrooms with shower, and free Wi-Fi is available in the entire complex.

Guests have free access to the large wellness area, which offers a Bio sauna, Finnish sauna, jacuzzi and several types of steam baths. There is also a fitness room and guests can book a therapy treatment or a massage for an extra charge.

The restaurant serves national specialities, while the bar has an extensive drinks menu and opens late into the evening.

Guests can drive to the Golf & Ski Resort Ostravice in 10 minutes and the distance to Roznov Pod Radhostem is 20 km.
