Description: HeadLine : Near Abingdon Abbey  Location : Located in Abingdon, Hilton Garden Inn Abingdon Oxford is in the historical district, within a 15-minute drive of Frilford Heath Golf Club and University of Oxford.  This 4-star hotel is 7.5 mi (12.1 km) from Christ Church College and 7.7 mi (12.4 km) from Covered Market.  Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 146 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.  Dining : Stop by the hotel s restaurant, The Restaurant, for lunch, dinner, or brunch. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Description:
Just 150 metres from the sandy beach of Kallithea in Chalkidiki, Orchidea features a gym and a spa centre with sauna and hot tub. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a spacious balcony.

Tastefully decorated in earthy colours, all rooms come with a fridge, a minibar and an electric kettle. Each features a flat-screen satellite TV and safe. The private bathroom is stocked with bathrobes and a hairdryer.

Guests will find restaurants, bars and clubs within 1 km from Orchidea, while various shops are 50 metres away. Thessaloniki International Airport is at a distance of 80 km, while the scenic Afitos Village is 3 km away. Free public parking can be found nearby. Please note that extra beds are only provided upon request and must be confirmed by the hotel.

Kindly note that property has no lift.

Please note that the use of an extra bed is upon charge and will be paid locally.

Description:
Morfeas Hotel is located in Chalkida Town, approximately 1 km from the town centre. It offers rooms with town views, while free WiFi is available in public areas.

Each room here will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. There is also a refrigerator. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.

A grill house and fish tavernas are within proximity of Morfeas. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge.

The hotel is 600 metres from the port. Eleftherios Venizelos Airport is 90 km away. Free public parking is possible nearby. Please inform Morfeas Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Situated 100 metres from Orange Beach, 3.4 km from Adventure Island and 5 km from Orange Beach Waterfront Park, Turquoise Place D1702 offers accommodation set in Orange Beach. This holiday home features free private parking, an ATM and free WiFi.

The air-conditioned holiday home is composed of 3 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom.

The Wharf Amphitheatre is 9 km from the holiday home, while The Wharf is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Pensacola International Airport, 51 km from Turquoise Place D1702. In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Turquoise Place D1702 in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Primary guest must be 25 years of age or older to check-in
Once reservation is paid in full, guests can expect to receive a welcome package and check-in instructions containing electronic door codes. Please contact property management for detail.?

Description:
Niza Apartments are located in Paguera, south west of Mallorca Island. Each air-conditioned studio features a balcony with stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea.

Studios at Niza offer direct access to Palmira Beach and Palmira Paguera Boulevard. Decorated simply, they feature a TV, a private bathroom with a bathtub and a kitchenette including an electric hob. A safe can be rented.

A variety of bars, restaurants and supermarkets can also be found in the surrounding area.

You can drive to Palma de Mallorca Airport in around 40 minutes. The property can arrange an airport transfer for a supplement. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform INNER Niza Paguera in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Please note that the studios are located in a building without a lift.

Please note that the reception is open from 09.00 to 14.00, 6 days per week
Address: Niza 9 direct access to the beach and Palmira Paguera Boulevard07160 PagueraCalvia

Description:
Flair Hotel Hopfengarten in Miltenberg is said to be one of the best addresses in the region Mainviereck.

The 3-star hotel is located in the heart of romantic Miltenberg.
Relax in tastefully and individually furnished guest rooms and suites, equipped with shower/hairdryer/WC/ large flat-screen TV/Tel/Sky TV and free W-LAN.
In summer you can also enjoy breakfast on a beautiful terrace.
In the old town there are numerous eateries, which are within walking distance of 1-10 minutes.
A secure storage facility for your bicycles is available.
New from summer 2022: Our terrace in the old barn to sit and relax. Please inform Flair Hotel Hopfengarten in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set in Manresa, Les Cabanes de lOller del Mas offers free WiFi, and guests can enjoy free bikes, a fitness centre and a garden.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A fridge and minibar are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the lodge. At Les Cabanes de lOller del Mas you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Hiking and cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 69 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Les Cabanes de lOller del Mas in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Guests need to meet one or more requirements to stay in this property: proof of full Coronavirus (Covid-19) vaccination, a recent valid negative Coronavirus PCR test, or recent proof of Coronavirus recovery.
Tourist registration number: KCC-00229
Address: CTRA. DIGUALADA (C-37Z), KM 91 CTRA DIGUALADA (C-37Z), KM 91, 08241

Description:
Dating back to the early Middle Ages, Villa Cicolina  is now a charming hotel. Boasting fantastic views of the Tuscan countryside, it guarantees a personalised service and an unforgettable stay.

Set close to Montepulciano, this was once the country retreat of a noble family. It features antique furniture, original paintings and frescoed ceilings. Explore the large, private gardens which lead down to a small church. The garden features a swimming pool with hydromassage, which is surrounded by olive groves.

Villa Cicolina has lots of large open spaces where you can relax with a book. Make sure to visit the wine cellar, home to a large collection of wines and olive oil. Enjoy a delicious 4-course menu at the restaurant, specialising in traditional, Tuscan cuisine.

Guest rooms are located on the ground, first and second floors. There are also separate rooms which are set in cottages and have their own garden. In the lobby there is free Wi-Fi and a free internet point. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isnt accepting guests from certain countries, during dates where such guidelines exist.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travellers, during dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isnt provided, your booking will be cancelled on arrival.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), please ensure that you are only booking this property following the local government guidelines of the destination, including but not limited to the purpose of travel, and maximum allowed group size.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
Piscina n. 1 is closed from Tue 31 Oct 2023 until Sun 31 Mar 2024
Restaurant #1 is closed from Tue 31 Oct 2023 until Sun 31 Mar 2024
Bar is closed from Tue 31 Oct 2023 until Sun 31 Mar 2024
The swimming pool is open from the beginning of May to the end of September.

When booking the meal option, please note that beverages are not included.

Description:
2B Quail Meadow is situated in Wawona, 45 km from Yosemite Valley, 47 km from Vernal Falls, and 47 km from Glacier Point.

The chalet is equipped with a satellite TV. The kitchen features a fridge, an oven and a dishwasher, as well as coffee machine.

El Capitan is 49 km from the chalet, while Yosemite South Entrance is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Fresno Yosemite International Airport, 109 km from 2B Quail Meadow. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please note that the full amount of the reservation is due before arrival. The Redwoods In Yosemite will send a confirmation with detailed payment information. After full payment is taken, the propertys details, including the address and where to collect keys, will be emailed to you.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests will receive a rental agreement which must be signed and returned to the property prior to arrival. If the agreement is not received, the guest should contact the property management company at the number on the booking confirmation. Guests under the age of 21 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.

Description:
Located in the medieval spa town Harkány, Paprika vendégház offers individually furnished studios with a balcony and a kitchenette. Free access to Wi-Fi is available in all areas.

The studios have parquet and tile floors and are equipped with cable TV, a kitchenette, a dining area and kitchenware. Towels are provided.

Guests can relax on the terrace or in the garden at Paprika vendégház. Free closed, private parking is also offered on site.

The thermal bath is only 300 metres away. The property offers a Harkány Card, which provides discounts on the entry to the bath, several restaurants in Harkány and several museums in Pécs. The wine region of Villány can be reached within a 30-minute drive. Please inform Paprika vendégház in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please note that the property also accepts OTP and MKB SZÉP Cards as a method of payment.

Description:
Home2 Suites By Hilton North Little Rock, Ar features air-conditioned rooms with cable flat-screen TV in the North Little Rock district of North Little Rock. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 7.3 km from Verizon Arena.

Some rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a dishwasher and a toaster. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast.

Home2 Suites By Hilton North Little Rock, Ar offers a barbecue. You can play billiards at this 3-star hotel.

Statehouse Convention Center is 8.7 km from the accommodation, while River Market District is 8.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Clinton National Airport, 14 km from Home2 Suites By Hilton North Little Rock, Ar. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Description: HeadLine : In Munich (Ramersdorf - Perlach)  Location : With a stay at Concept Living Munich, you ll be centrally located in Munich, a 4-minute drive from Gasteig and 10 minutes from Munich Trade Fair.
